flawed_nl_solution:
The third level has 80 books because 64 / 0.8 = <<64/0.8=80>>80
The second level has 1000 books because 80 / 0.8 = <<80/0.8=1000>>1000
The first level has 1250 books because 1000 / 0.8 = <<1000/0.8=1250>>1250
In total there are 2394 books because 64 + 80 + 1000 + 1250 = <<64+80+1000+1250=2394>>2394

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100.0, not 1000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
